ComicInfo.Series: Cosmic Ghost Rider Destroys Marvel History
ComicInfo.Summary:
Cosmic Ghost Rider Destroys...World War II?!
Witness the true story of how the Allies won the war...
Thanks Cosmic Ghost Rider!
